data.chText: 耸肩（表示不知道或不在乎）
data.enText: to raise your shoulders and then drop them to show that you do not know or care about sth

data.chText: 萨姆耸耸肩膀，什么也没说。
data.enText: Sam shrugged and said nothing.

data.chText: “我不知道。”安娜耸耸肩膀，应了一句。
data.enText: ‘I don't know,’ Anna replied, shrugging her shoulders.
Andy gave a shrug. ‘It doesn't matter.’
shrug sth off/aside

data.chText: 不把…当回事；对…满不在乎；对…不予理睬
data.enText: to treat sth as if it is not important

data.chText: 她受了伤，却继续进行比赛。
data.enText: Shrugging off her injury, she played on.

data.chText: 对于要求他辞职的建议，他根本不予理会。
data.enText: He shrugged aside suggestions that he resign.
shrug sb/sth off/away
to push sb/sth back or away with your shoulders

data.chText: 凯文肩膀一抖，脱掉了夹克。
data.enText: Kevin shrugged off his jacket.
She shrugged him away angrily.

word_means: 女式短茄克衫或前开襟毛线衫

means: 耸肩(表示不知道或不在乎)
女式短茄克衫或前开襟毛线衫

data.enText: shrug sth off/aside

data.chText: 不把…当回事；对…满不在乎；对…不予理睬
data.enText: to treat sth as if it is not important

data.chText: 她受了伤，却继续进行比赛。
data.enText: Shrugging off her injury, she played on.

data.chText: 对于要求他辞职的建议，他根本不予理会。
data.enText: He shrugged aside suggestions that he resign.
shrug sb/sth off/away
to push sb/sth back or away with your shoulders

data.chText: 凯文肩膀一抖，脱掉了夹克。
data.enText: Kevin shrugged off his jacket.
She shrugged him away angrily.

trans: 把…不当回事；对…置之不理；对…满不在乎

tr: raise one's shoulders to indicate indifference or resignation

value.def: If you shrug, you raise your shoulders to show that you are not interested in something or that you do not know or care about something.

example.ex: I shrugged, as if to say, 'Why not?'...
example.tran: 我耸了耸肩，仿佛在说，“为什么不?”

example.ex: 'I suppose so,' said Anna with a shrug.
example.tran: “我想是吧，”安娜耸了耸肩说道。

value.tran: 耸肩(表示不感兴趣、不知道或不在乎)
